description: Update a project phase cost item price estimate
permissions: User must be authorized to update the related project phase cost item (delegated via ProjectPhaseCostItemPolicy).
side_effects: Updates the estimate and/or relationships for a project phase cost item price estimate.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument. At least one of --estimate, --project-estimate-set, or --created-by must be provided. If --estimate is provided, it must be valid JSON representing an object; "null" is allowed. If --project-estimate-set or --created-by is provided, the value cannot be empty.

flags.name: --estimate
flags.validation: Must be valid JSON that parses to an object; "null" is allowed.

flags.name: --project-estimate-set
flags.validation: If provided, must be a non-empty string.

flags.name: --created-by
flags.validation: If provided, must be a non-empty string.
